channel.title: heesungjang.com posts feed
channel.description: All the posts from my personal blog about programming.

item.title: Understanding Lambda Calculus: The Mathematics Behind Functional Programming
item.description: Lambda calculus is a mathematical model for understanding computation using just three simple rules. Created by Alonzo Church, it became the foundation for functional programming languages like OCaml and Haskell.
item.author: heesungj7@gmail.com

item.title: Understanding bind Through Promise Implementation
item.description: Ever had JavaScript's `this` point to something unexpected? Let's build a Promise from scratch to see how `bind()` keeps `this` predictable in asynchronous code.
item.author: heesungj7@gmail.com

item.title: Observable & Provider Patterns in Redux
item.description: Redux still powers many production apps despite newer alternatives. Building Redux from scratch reveals how Observable and Provider patterns work together to manage state.
item.author: heesungj7@gmail.com

item.title: Why Our SPFx Web Parts Randomly Disappeared (And How We Fixed It)
item.description: Some of our SharePoint web parts were randomly failing to render for certain users. The problem? An async/await call in onInit() that seemed harmless until it wasn't.
item.author: heesungj7@gmail.com
